name: Monkey Magic (itch) (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1985. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Join Monkey on his first Quest in search of the Holy scriptures. This will involve a long and perilous journey on his Magic cloud. High in the air you will encounter many evil forces, use your magic staff to fire at, and destroy the evil creatures of the universe. You have three lives, and a score is given for each creature you destroy. Good luck! Monkey Magic! 

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: Z
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: Z

Start the game: A
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN
Fire: A

 

Monkey Magic - Solar Software
